resources.string:
- A game consists of 11 or 21 points
 - Each player serves 2 or 5 points in a row and then switch server. - If a score is 10-10 or 20-20, the game goes in to extra play until one of the players has gained a lead of 2 points
 - If a score is 10-10 or 20-20, then each server serves only 1 point and then the server is switched.
 - A match is played best 2 of 3 or 3 of 5 games
 - A point is scored after each ball is put into play
 - The edges of the table are part of the legal table surface, but not the sides.
